alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:37PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton County through 715 PM EDT... At 636 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jennings, moving slowly west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Hamilton County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
